title: Hazelnut cake
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '225g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125ml milk', '1 tablespoon rum', '250g plain flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '250g ground hazelnuts', 'For the glaze', '1 heaped teaspoon instant coffee granules', '1 tablespoon hot water', '200g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon melted butter']
